Engineers quality to scale with the business.**

organizations.name: Oracle India Private Limited
organizations.description: Led QA initiatives for cloud-based hospitality applications, architecting enterprise automation frameworks, AI-powered validation engines, and intelligent reporting platforms.

projects.title: ETL Sentinel — AI-Powered Autonomous Data Migration Validation at Scale
projects.problem: Validating data migration integrity across hundreds of Oracle Database tables required manual triage, lacked intelligent schema discovery, and couldn't scale across complex data transformations.
projects.solution: Built a fully autonomous, AI-powered framework that validates data migration integrity across Oracle Database migrations using intelligent fuzzy matching, OCI GenAI-driven schema discovery, and adaptive statistical validation. Eliminated manual triage through automated issue classification and executive-level reporting.
projects.impact: 900+ tables validated, 100% schema discovery accuracy, 3-tier adaptive validation, 80% triage time reduction, executive reporting dashboard

projects.title: Schema Intelligence Engine — Agentic AI-Powered GraphQL Payload Generation with Self-Learning Fusion
projects.problem: Manually mapping Apollo GraphQL schemas with database metadata was error-prone and unscalable, requiring intelligent field name resolution across 115K+ fields from multiple schema sources.
projects.solution: Engineered an agentic AI engine that intelligently fuses Apollo GraphQL schemas with database metadata using OCI GenAI. Automates production-ready GraphQL payload generation through hybrid matching algorithms, confidence-scored categorization, and a self-correcting learning system — processing 115K+ fields at scale.
projects.impact: 98% reduction in LLM API calls, 115K+ fields processed, self-improving accuracy, 100% payload validation, fuse once generate unlimited payloads

projects.title: OHRA Reporter — Zero-Infrastructure Test Intelligence Dashboard
projects.problem: Raw test execution data from multiple frameworks (JUnit, Karate, pytest) lacked unified visualization, requiring manual effort for cross-environment comparison, regression detection, and executive reporting.
projects.solution: Built a self-contained reporting platform that transforms raw test execution data from any major framework into executive-ready interactive dashboards — featuring cross-environment comparison, regression detection, SLA health scoring, and statistical significance testing. Deploys as a single HTML file with zero infrastructure dependencies, integrating directly into CI/CD pipelines.
projects.impact: Test triage reduced from hours to seconds, 4-environment comparison, 100% framework-agnostic, zero-dependency deployment, data-driven go/no-go decisions

projects.title: GraphQL API Regression Framework — 2,200+ Auto-Generated Test Cases Across 534 Views, Zero Manual Authoring
projects.problem: Regression testing across 534 GraphQL views with 46,600+ column mappings required a scalable, schema-driven approach that could auto-generate tests and detect cross-version schema drift without manual test authoring.
projects.solution: Architected a schema-driven, data-driven test automation platform that auto-generates 2,200+ parametrized test cases per run from JSON schema snapshots — covering 534 GraphQL views across 75 subject areas. Features a 3-phase pipeline (Ingestion → Generation → Execution), parallel execution, and pluggable modular architecture across 154 source modules (~43K LOC). Onboarding a new API version requires just 4 JSON files — zero test rewrites.
projects.impact: 2,200+ test cases auto-generated, 534 views × 46,600+ column mappings, 6 schema versions covered, regression reduced to single pipeline run, 100% schema-driven onboarding, cross-version drift detection

projects.title: Agentic AI QA Framework — Evaluating & Factual Grounding for AI Agents
projects.problem: Validating AI agent responses for hallucinations, data mismatches, and behavioral regressions required a multi-tier evaluation engine that could independently verify accuracy against live backend API data.
projects.solution: Engineered an automated evaluation platform that validates AI agent responses against live backend API data using a three-tier assessment engine — LLM-based comparison, deterministic guards, and semantic fallback. Systematically catches hallucinations, data mismatches, and behavioral regressions by independently fetching ground-truth from OPERA Cloud APIs and scoring accuracy, toxicity, bias, and tone across hundreds of prompt variations. Template-driven authoring enables non-engineers to add test scenarios via JSON.
projects.impact: 100% automated hallucination detection, three-tier evaluation with zero single points of failure, Precision/Recall/F1 metrics powering go/no-go decisions, QA cycle reduced from hours to single-command runs

projects.title: Playwright Full-Stack Regression Framework — Unified UI + API Validation for Oracle RnA Portals
projects.problem: End-to-end regression testing across three interconnected Oracle systems (Admin Portal, RnA Portal, Platform System) was manual, consuming 44+ hours per release cycle with no visual regression coverage.
projects.solution: Architected an end-to-end TypeScript-based Playwright framework for Oracle RnA Application Portal that orchestrates a complete cross-system validation workflow — generates test data via Admin Portal APIs, executes UI regression suites on the RnA Portal, and validates downstream data integrity against Platform System APIs. Includes pixel-level visual regression testing, delivering full-stack traceability across three interconnected systems in a single automated pipeline run.
projects.impact: 44+ hours saved per release cycle, 3-system orchestration automated (Admin Portal API → RnA UI → Platform System API), pixel-level visual regression catching UI/UX drift, 100% full-stack traceability in one pipeline
